situation: A simply supported beam is reinforced with 4-28mm bars at the bottom and 2-28mm bars at the top. Steel covering to centroid of the reinforcement is 70mm at the top and bottom of the beam. The beam has a total depth of 400mm and a width of 300mm. Use f'c=30MPa and fy=420MPa.

subquestions.question: Determine the depth of compression block, in mm
Determine the design strength of the beam in kN-m
Determine the concentrated service live load (kN) at the midspan of the beam in addition to a total service dead load of 20kN/m if it has a span of 6 meters. Use U=1.2D+1.6L
